amendment.description: To use Federal and State expertise to mitigate fish and wildlife impacts at Corps of Engineers projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3871, under the order of 5/11/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 69.

action.text: Amendment SA 3871 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2680-2681, S2699; text: CR S2681) To use Federal and State expertise to mitigate fish and wildlife impacts at Corps of Engineers projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3871 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3801.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3871, under the order of 5/11/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 69.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3871, under the order of 5/11/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 69.
